name: Ch16ABaseConvo5
_source: speak;Larachel;The rumors were true...|Renais castle has fallen to darkness.|Such wickedness cannot be allowed to stand!
speak;Natasha;It pains me to see a once-proud kingdom reduced to this.|Orson's betrayal has brought nothing but suffering.
speak;Larachel;The traitor Orson must answer for his crimes!|As a servant of the divine, I cannot abide such evil.|His twisted obsession has corrupted these sacred halls!
speak;Natasha;But L'Arachel...|He was once a good man, a loyal knight.|Is there no redemption possible for him?
speak;Larachel;My dear Natasha, your compassion is admirable.|However, some darkness runs too deep.|Such desecration cannot be forgiven!
speak;Natasha;I...|I have heard what he has done, but I could not believe them to be true.
speak;Larachel;The light of righteousness must purge this castle of its taint!|I, L'Arachel, princess of the theocracy of Rausten, shall banish this wickedness!
speak;Natasha;I understand your zeal, but we must not lose our own humanity in the process.|Vengeance alone cannot restore what was lost.
speak;Larachel;This is not vengeance, my friend.|This is divine judgment!|The sacred light shall cleanse this corruption!
speak;Natasha;...|You are right.|His tyranny has brought too much suffering.|For the people of Renais, this must end.
speak;Larachel;Then we are of one mind at last!|Together, we shall return this castle to its rightful glory!
speak;Natasha;I have something that may help.|This <blue>Light tome</> contains powerful ancient magic.
speak;Larachel;Oh!|Is this truly for me?|How magnificent!
speak;Natasha;Use it wisely.|May the sacred light guide your hand against the darkness that Orson has wrought.
speak;Larachel;With this divine power and our righteous cause, we cannot fail!|The darkness shall be vanquished!|Evil shall be purged!|And I, L'Arachel, shall lead the charge!
speak;Natasha;May the gods watch over us all in the battle to come.
speak;Larachel;Fear not, citizens of Renais!|Your salvation is at hand!|The darkness shall soon be lifted from your fair kingdom!
